page.title: 09ULLAPOOL FAMILIES.
page.content: THOMAS - On Sundays we usually go out in the car to the Dam Lochs. KENNETH - Mum washes and grades the eggs then Dad delivers them to the customers. JULIAN - My name is Julian Peukert, pronounced 'Poy - kert.' JAMIE - We have to carry our dustbins to the main North road to be emptied by the Refuse Disposal Operators who come from Dingwall. SANDY - I usually do 15 minutes violin practice every day,except Sundays. HELEN - On Wednesdays,Guides meet from 7.30pm.to 8.30pm. Our uniform is a blue blouse and a navy skirt. CRAIG - On summer evenings I help plant the garden,have a bath or shower,put on pyjamas and go to bed. KENNETH - Before going to bed,I make hot chocolate,cover budgie,put guard over fire and listen to story-tape.
